question.body: The chemicals released by neurons which allow communication with other cells are termed what?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Hormones are released by the endocrine systm.
Correct. Neurotransmitters are released at a synapse which is a junction between two neurons or between a neuron and another cell.
Incorrect. Meninges are the connective tissue coverings that surround the brain and spinal cord.

part.hint: These chemicals are released by neurons and critical for the functioning of the nervous system.
